meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family with blue or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The baptisia in the garden has beautiful blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a baptisia in my backyard for its lovely white blooms.
meanings.sent3: The baptisia in the field waved its blue flowers in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The baptisia stood out like a blue jewel among the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The blue baptisia added a pop of color to the garden.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the baptisia belongs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the baptisia genus to learn more about these plants.
meanings.sent2: The baptisia genus includes various species with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: In the botanical garden, the baptisia genus was displayed prominently.
meanings.sent4: The baptisia genus is like a family tree for these plants.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the baptisia genus reveals the diversity of these plants.
